Package common.dataClasses

Class Item

java.lang.Object
common.dataClasses.Asset
common.dataClasses.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
IData, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CartItem
public class Item
extends Asset
Represents an item - an quantifiable version of an asset possessed by an organisation.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Item​(Asset asset, int quantity)
    Initialises an item by linking it to an asset and includes the quantity to be stored.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add​(int amount)
    Increases the quantity of the related asset in the organisation's stock.
    int getQuantity()
    Retrieves the quantity of the asset that is owned by the organisation.
    boolean isOutOfStock()
    Checks if the asset is out of stock.
    CartItem moveToCart​(int amount, float price)
    Moves a certain amount of the current asset to a cart.
    void setQuantity​(int quantity)
    Sets the quantity of the asset to a new value.

    Methods inherited from class common.dataClasses.Asset

    getDescription, getId, getName, setDescription, setId, setName

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item​(Asset asset, int quantity)
      Initialises an item by linking it to an asset and includes the quantity to be stored.
      Parameters:
      asset - The asset type of the item.
      quantity - The quantity to be stored.

  • Method Details

    • getQuantity

      public int getQuantity()
      Retrieves the quantity of the asset that is owned by the organisation.
      Returns:
      The quantity of the asset.

    • setQuantity

      public void setQuantity​(int quantity)
      Sets the quantity of the asset to a new value.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The new quantity.

    • add

      public void add​(int amount)
      Increases the quantity of the related asset in the organisation's stock.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to be added.

    • isOutOfStock

      public boolean isOutOfStock()
      Checks if the asset is out of stock.
      Returns:
      true if there are no asset left in the stock, false otherwise.

    • moveToCart

      public CartItem moveToCart​(int amount, float price)
      Moves a certain amount of the current asset to a cart.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of asset to be moved to cart.
      price - The price of the asset.
      Returns:
      An instance of the current asset, but in cart.
